title: Preparing for HTB CDSA Exam
description: Currently preparing for the Hack The Box Certified Defensive Security Analyst (CDSA) exam to enhance defensive security skills, through solving Sherlocks and practical defensive security scenarios.

title: Solved and Documented "CrownJewel-1" Sherlock by Hack The Box
description: Solved the "CrownJewel-1" Sherlock by Hack The Box, which involved parsing MFT records and Windows event logs to investigate a security incident, and documented the entire process in a detailed writeup.

title: Solved and Documented "LogJammer" Sherlock by Hack The Box
description: Completed the "LogJammer" Sherlock by Hack The Box, analyzing Windows Event Logs to investigate a security incident and uncovering the attack chain while documenting the process.
